tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came here on Saturday with huge pain in my both ankles , Dr. Jayanta understood my pain and recommended for ankle ultrasound and found joints swalling and fluid inside. Whatever he recommends  for test it's found positive that shows how competent he is in his profession. He was nice humble, and also a good listener. All staff members are also good. Now iam atleast able to walk. He counselled me very well. I wish and pray to god for his wellness because we really need doc like him. All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jayanta Thakuria is a very nice doctor as he would treat based upon symptoms apart from test reports , that his best part. He is very polite and humble while consulting. I had great experience of his consultation while I got severe pneumonia and through his tele medication he saved my life without visiting hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a very warm and wonderful experience with Dr Jayant...I consulted him online for the Corona crises which affected all my family members....under his guidance and timely intervention ,my family got well soon without any complication...
         Dr Jayant is a very efficient and dedicated doctor.....I extend my gratitude and appreciate his effective management , prompt response and helping nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am really sad that I have to interact with a doc like Dr Jayant 

** *** **** ********* ***** *** **** **** ****** ****** **** ******* *** ******** 

***** **** ** **** ******** **** *** ****** ** ** ***** ***** ** *****
He did not listen to my condition neither did he explain the medicine and how it is supposed to be administered. 

He neither explain for how long am I supposed to consume the medicine. 

****** *** **** ***** ****** **** ********** ******* *************
reply_text:
Sorry u fired n didnâ€™t take time in insulting without knowing about the pandemic n what is corona . I will clarify all ur points one by one
1. Fees - yes I used to get  calls throughout the day asking idiotic queries like whether they can hv mango shakes n Apple juice , tab with water or milk , tea or coffee . So I didnâ€™t want to listen to those non relevant queries in this pandemic crisis so to save my time for people in need . Paying a practo fee doesnâ€™t mean u buy the doctor for ur irrelevant queries or for the whole consecutive week. 
2. Tab or liquid are to b taken orally by mouth so question of administration doesnâ€™t exist..I take it as all knows
3. Since covid is a ongoing disease which need assessment every third day I cant assure about the duration of treatment. Yes with regular follow up treatment changes from time to time

tags: None
review: Dr. Thakuria lives in our condominium and therefore, I chanced upon him during a critical need situation in the past. I found him to be very professional, affable and capable. He has happily accommodated multiple requests for urgent consultations in the past. We never had to seek a second opinion under his care. Dr. Thakuria has become our de facto family physician. Very highly recommended.
